description:
Lightweight go anywhere, do anything shorts. They live up to their name and can keep up with even the most active kids.Lightweight recycled blend fabric has easy stretch.DWR finish sheds light rain and helps dust brush off.Hand pockets keep small must-haves close.Elasticised waistband with an internal drawcord adjust to fit growth spurts.Name label helps make game of “whose is whose” a bit easier.4-inch inseam.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material














                      Recycled content
name: MEC Movement Shorts - Girls' - Youths
